ideas.title: The Bourke Street Bounce House
ideas.premise: Melbourne City Council announces the new infrastructure project: a giant inflatable bounce house installed permanently on Bourke Street.
ideas.why_funny: Absurd infrastructure solution to pedestrian traffic problems; very Melbourne-centric location.

ideas.title: The Seagulls Know
ideas.premise: The weather forecast shows clear skies, but a flock of seagulls is wearing tiny raincoats and carrying umbrellas.
ideas.why_funny: Seagulls are the true weather experts; classic Aussie distrust of weather reports.

ideas.title: The Great Footy Heist
ideas.premise: A rival team plots to steal the AFL Premiership Cup, only to discover it's guarded by a surprisingly aggressive ibis.
ideas.why_funny: Footy obsession meets the iconic bin chicken; plays on sporting rivalries.

ideas.title: Lygon Street Conga Line
ideas.premise: A community event draws such large crowds that a conga line spontaneously forms, stretching the entire length of Lygon Street.
ideas.why_funny: Italian community, crowded streets, spontaneous joy, quintessential Melbourne.

ideas.title: The Laneway Lager Boom
ideas.premise: A local craft brewery expands, taking over an entire Melbourne laneway and renaming it "Lager Lane."
ideas.why_funny: Melbourne's love of laneways and craft beer gets taken to the extreme.

headlines.title: Local government discusses new infrastructure project in Melbourne
headlines.summary: City council meets to discuss improvements

headlines.summary: Recent victory keeps hopes alive for title
